process.command:
dsid TEXT NOT NULL,   
			dsname VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,
			instid TEXT NOT NULL,
			regionid varchar(64) NOT NULL,
			regioncat VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,
			title VARCHAR(256),
			label VARCHAR(256),
			dataurl VARCHAR(256),
			metaurl VARCHAR(256),
			metapath VARCHAR(256),
			datadir VARCHAR(256),
			datafile VARCHAR(256),
			startdate DATE,
			enddate DATE, 
			PRIMARY KEY(dsid)

dsid TEXT,   
			compid  TEXT,
			PRIMARY KEY(dsid,compid)

plotid TEXT,
			siteid TEXT,
			aream2 integer,
			userownid varchar(32),
			biome varchar(32),
			share smallint DEFAULT 5,
			lat double precision,
			lon double precision,
			createdate date DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
			PRIMARY KEY (plotid)

plotid TEXT,
			siteid TEXT,
			aream2 integer,
			userownid varchar(32),
			biome varchar(32),
			share smallint DEFAULT 5,
			createdate date DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
			PRIMARY KEY (plotid)

plotid TEXT,
			obsdate date,
			domsurface varchar(32),
			domsurfshare integer,
			domuse varchar(32),
			domuseshare integer,
			domcover varchar(32),
			domcovershare integer,
			erosion varchar(32),
			erosionshare integer,
			dommngmt varchar(32),
			PRIMARY KEY (plotid,obsdate)

plotid TEXT,
			toposcale integer,
			slope real,
			aspect real,
			elevation real,
			profc real,
			longc real,
			crosc real,
			cellstats varchar(32),
			PRIMARY KEY (plotid,toposcale,cellstats)

plotid TEXT,
			s_scale integer,
			l_scale integer,
			TPI real,
			TRI real,
			TPIlf varchar(32),
			curvlf varchar(32),
			cellstats varchar(32),
			PRIMARY KEY (plotid,s_scale,l_scale,cellstats)

plotid TEXT,
			runoff real,
			obsdate varchar(8),
			PRIMARY KEY (plotid,runoff,obsdate)

plotid TEXT,
			obsdate date,
			species varchar(32) DEFAULT 'all',
			spshare integer,
			spcover integer,
			spvol real,
			spage real,
			spagb real,
			spstemdens real,
			spbiomass real,
			spheight real,
			spharvest real,
			spharvestdate date,
			spphase varchar(16),
			PRIMARY KEY (plotid,obsdate,species)

plotid TEXT,
 			path smallint,
 			row smallint,
 			wrs character(1),
 			ascdesc character(1) DEFAULT 'D',
 			PRIMARY KEY (plotid,path,row,wrs,ascdesc)

plotid TEXT,
 			h smallint,
 			v smallint,
 			PRIMARY KEY (plotid)

processx.command:
plotid TEXT,
			obsdate date,
			infiltration real,
			rootpendepth real,
			texture varchar(64),
			PRIMARY KEY (plotid,acqdate)

plotid TEXT,
			obsdate date,
			infiltration real,
			rootpendepth real,
			PRIMARY KEY (plotid,acqdate)
